data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Penny has taught English at the high school for nearly twenty years. She ____ teaching ____ after ____. She ____ to ____ about ____ books ____ to ____ her ____ for ____ with ____ students. But she does not enjoy reading her students' writing very much!
data.partBlankContent: Penny has taught English at the high school for nearly twenty years. She sta____ teaching ri___ after col____. She li___ to te___ about gr___ books a__ to sh___ her lo__ for rea____ with h__ students. But she does not enjoy reading her students' writing very much!
data.fullContent: Penny has taught English at the high school for nearly twenty years. She started teaching right after college. She likes to teach about great books and to share her love for reading with her students. But she does not enjoy reading her students' writing very much!
data.answer: 彭妮在这所高中教英语已经快二十年了。她大学一毕业就开始教书。她喜欢教授好的书籍，并与她的学生分享她对阅读的热爱。但是她不太喜欢看学生们写的东西!
